attributes.action: Reinstate the Rail Link bus between Romsey and Winchester
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: From 9 December, the Rail Link bus run by South West Trains between Romsey and Winchester will be withdrawn, forcing more people into cars and causing frustration for commuters, students and others. At a time when the Government is nominally promoting public transport, this is clearly hypocritical and short-sighted on the part of SWT.
